name: jQuery.isArray
title: jQuery.isArray()
desc: Determine whether the argument is an array.

argument.desc: Object to test whether or not it is an array.
argument.name: obj

examples.desc: Finds out if the parameter is an array.

entries.longdesc: $.isArray() returns a Boolean indicating whether the object is a JavaScript array (not an array-like object, such as a jQuery object).
